title: New: scarrXscarr – Feels Like You Were Right
content:
One play after seven days of being online? Internet hype machine, you’re letting me down.

This excellent ‘debut’ track (I say that as scarrXscarr has featured on CitR previously, under another name), from San Francisco’s scarrXscarr is a bold first outing, experimenting with a very current R&B / indie sound. Layered vocals and smooth synths dominate this self-described ‘primal / mood pop’, with touches of SOHN and The Weeknd littered throughout. Check out Feels Like You Were Right below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
